prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Piano, Guitar, and Drums are the instruments used in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, but Bass is not included.

Style 3:
This composition features Organ, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, but Bass is not part of it.
